modShortDescription: This mod decreases the decay rate on zombie loot bags from 5 to 30 minutes.
modDescription:
This mod decreases the decay rate on [zombie](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-zombies/) loot bags from 5 to 30 minutes.

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/Donovan522/donovan-7d2d-modlets/tree/stable/donovan-longerlootbags)**

If you find any issues or have a suggestion for improvement, please [open an issue](https://github.com/Donovan522/donovan-7d2d-modlets/issues) and Donovan will look into it ASAP.

**Credits:** [Donovan](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/donovan/)
